document_data.mainbody:
Hemtor Dauntrael was the fabled child of Shalima Dauntrael.
Hemtors father was a marilith, and originally he wouldve slain his mother in childbirth, but she whelmed powerful sorcery to alter his nature while still in the womb. While he still had a wild temperament all his life, he only developed a few demonic traits. Finally, he became a hiresword and died fighting pirates in the Sea of Fallen Stars, proving sterile before that point.
